project_abstract.cdata: The Second Railway Project consists of the following components: (a) upgrading and electrification of the line between Zhengzhou and Wuhan, a 547 km central section of the Beijing-Guangzhou main line, and a 72 km feeder line to the large coal mines at Pingdingshan; (b) the first stage of a modernization program of the passenger coach factory at Changchun, which will provide technical assistance necessary to increase the quantity and improve the quality of current production and determine the investment needed for production of a new coach design of 1,500 per year; (c) assistance for new laboratories and staff training at the China Academy of Railway Sciences; (d) a Management Information System study to lay the basis for improving the railway's managerial and operational efficiency; and (e) assistance to railway universities in updating their curricula.

P003437.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二铁路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目包括以下内容：（1）对京广线574公里长的核心路段郑州至武汉路段以及连接平顶山市大型煤矿的支线铁路进行电气化改造；（2）资助实施长春轨道客车厂现代化改造一期工程，为此将提供必要技术援助，以增加客车生产数量，提高客车质量，确定年产1500辆新型客车所需投资；（3）向中国铁路科学研究院的新建实验室和人员培训工作提供援助；（4）就管理信息系统开展研究，为提高铁路管理和运营效率奠定基础；（5）就铁路大学的课程更新修订工作提供援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
